content.question: The Fourteenth Amendment’s equal protection clause declares that “No State shall . . . deny to any person within its jurisdiction the equal protection of the laws.” In which of the following scenarios is this clause most likely to be used by the Supreme Court in its decision?

choices.label: A state law levies a tax on a bank established by the federal government.
Congress uses the commerce clause to establish a gun-free school zone.
A media company is prevented from publishing a classified document.
A local school district mandates racially segregated schools.

content.answer: A local school district mandates racially segregated schools.

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how a required Supreme Court case relates to a relevant political principle, institution, process, policy, or behavior.
